question: Some students were on a tour exploring the inside of a cave. While the students were in the cave, they realized they heard an echo every time that they spoke. Which most likely caused the echo to occur?
candidate_answers: (A) the accumulation of the sound waves (B) the diffraction of the sound waves (C) the refraction of the sound waves (D) the reflection of the sound waves
answer: the diffraction of the sound waves
label: B
